mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO COMMU_KEY_SET ( ID, MAC_NO, KEY_TYPE, IS_YIELD, DIRECTION, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{macNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isYield,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_COMMU_KEY_SET.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE COMMU_KEY_SET
MAC_NO = #{macNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEY_TYPE = #{keyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_YIELD = #{isYield,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DIRECTION = #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
